title: Frontend Developer
description: We are seeking a passionate Frontend Developer to join our fast-growing engineering team. You will work with React, TailwindCSS, and modern tooling to create interactive, scalable, and accessible user interfaces. This role requires strong attention to detail, deep knowledge of component architecture, and the ability to collaborate closely with backend and product teams to deliver features that delight users. You will also participate in code reviews, performance optimizations, and UI/UX discussions to ensure best-in-class experiences.

title: Backend Engineer
description: We are looking for a highly skilled Backend Engineer who enjoys building reliable, secure, and scalable APIs. You will design and implement backend systems using Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, and cloud technologies. Your responsibilities include writing clean code, improving system performance, and maintaining CI/CD processes. This position also requires strong problem-solving skills, the ability to debug complex distributed systems, and a commitment to writing thorough tests and improving developer workflows.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design user interfaces and experiences for web and mobile applications.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Work on both frontend and backend projects using React and Node.js.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Maintain CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and monitor system performance.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Develop iOS and Android apps using React Native.

title: QA Engineer
description: Write test cases and automate QA pipelines.

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyze data and build predictive models.

title: Cloud Architect
description: Design and maintain scalable cloud infrastructure.

title: Product Manager
description: Lead product strategy and manage development teams.
